CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL( Line_Status__c ,'Completed'), (Actual_Quantity2__c * Line_Price2__c) - ( Discount_Percentage__c * (Actual_Quantity2__c * Line_Price2__c)), IF(ISPICKVAL( Line_Status__c ,'Canceled'), 0,(Expected_Quantity2__c * Line_Price2__c) - ( Discount_Percentage__c * (Expected_Quantity2__c * Line_Price2__c))))
CustomField.label: Total Line Price
